verses.name: Ezekiel 27:19
verses.text: Dan also and Javan going to and fro occupied in thy fairs: bright iron, cassia, and calamus, were in thy market.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:20
verses.text: Dedan was thy merchant in precious clothes for chariots.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:21
verses.text: Arabia, and all the princes of Kedar, they occupied with thee in lambs, and rams, and goats: in these were they thy merchants.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:22
verses.text: The merchants of Sheba and Raamah, they were thy merchants: they occupied in thy fairs with chief of all spices, and with all precious stones, and gold.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:23
verses.text: Haran, and Canneh, and Eden, the merchants of Sheba, Asshur, and Chilmad, were thy merchants.
